SEARCH
Package ProgettoLaboratorioB.Database

Class DatabaseService

java.lang.Object
ProgettoLaboratorioB.Database.DatabaseService
public class DatabaseService extends Object
This class is used to create the tables in the database, if it is not already created. The tables are: • Users • Songs • Playlists • PlaylistSaved • Emotions The tables are created using SQL queries, ATTENTION: see the documentation for more details about constraints and relations.
Version:
0.0.1
Author:
Enrico Artese
